title: Gas Meter Access Issue
description: A meter reader was unable to access a customer's gas meter due to a locked gate. The system needs to notify the customer and schedule a new appointment.

tasks.description: Receive the 'No Access' report from the meter reader's handheld device.
tasks.expected_outcome: System logs the failed read attempt.

tasks.description: Automatically send a notification (email or text) to the customer explaining the issue and providing a link to reschedule.
Estimate the customer's bill for the current period based on historical usage.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates an estimated bill to avoid a billing delay.
